top_comments.comment: 1:07 This part always gives me chills
I wish they stopped making new champions for like 3 years or something and just did reworks like this to keep the game fresh and let the game balance easier to manage.

comments_since_last_sample.body: Do some changes to the animations, make it so Q and W speed scales with attack speed, also make it so E scales with movespeed, that way you fix the clunky aspects of the character, if it needs nerfs after that it could take a bit less Q base damage on later levels (since at that point in time, with a bit of extra attack speed it should be able to land it, also take in mind enemies get faster and faster so it's a needed change for the ability to be viable on late game, since right now it's more worth it to just autoattack)
censorship attacks the classic look of caitlyn an others .. it was coming, typical because in wild rift everything is censored.
